name: Ext_R2_OperationDefinition_pa_bi_valueSet
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.OperationDefinition.parameter.binding.valueSet[x] for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents OperationDefinition.parameter.binding.valueSet[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/OperationDefinition|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: Points to the value set or external definition (e.g. implicit value set) that identifies the set of codes to be used.
element.comment: `OperationDefinition.parameter.binding.valueSet[x]` maps to R4 `OperationDefinition.parameter.binding.valueSet`. Target added uri:canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ValueSet) target profiles: http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ValueSet Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ValueSet)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Points to the value set or external definition (e.g. implicit value set) that identifies the set of codes to be used.
element.comment: `OperationDefinition.parameter.binding.valueSet[x]` maps to R4 `OperationDefinition.parameter.binding.valueSet`. Target added uri:canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ValueSet) target profiles: http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ValueSet Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ValueSet)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
